aws_nat_gateway.description: Provides a resource to create a VPC NAT Gateway.

allocation_id.description: The Allocation ID of the Elastic IP address for the gateway.

subnet_id.description: The Subnet ID of the subnet in which to place the gateway.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the NAT Gateway.

allocation_id.description: The Allocation ID of the Elastic IP address for the gateway.

subnet_id.description: The Subnet ID of the subnet in which the NAT gateway is placed.

network_interface_id.description: The ENI ID of the network interface created by the NAT gateway.

private_ip.description: The private IP address of the NAT Gateway.

public_ip.description: The public IP address of the NAT Gateway.
